definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: A similar demonstration against Jewish shops took place in Essen yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天在埃森也發生了同樣的圍堵猶太商場的示威運動。

sentences.english: Motion demonstrations, especially when fast motion is involved, suffer from stroboscopic artefacts.
sentences.chinese: 示威運動，尤其是當快速運動的參與，受到頻閃文物。

sentences.english: They broke up the demonstration and dragged the parents away.
sentences.chinese: 他們解散了示威運動並把家長們拖開。
